articles.summary: The Dogecoin price has been stuck near $0.23 for the past week. This comes as DOGE whales rotate out to grow their capital with better-performing assets like the new AI project, Unilabs Finance (UNIL). UNIL was recently listed on CoinMarketCap.

articles.title: Strategy Adds 430 BTC Despite Market Correction
articles.author: Crypto Economy
articles.summary: Strategy bought 430 BTC for $51.4M at an average price of $119,666, raising its total holdings to 629,376 BTC valued at $46.15B. Strategy adjusted its MSTR Equity ATM issuance program with a NAV-based framework. MSTR shares fell from $366 to $366.

articles.title: Satoshi Nakamoto Finally Uncovered? Is Twitter Founder Jack Dorsey Bitcoin's Anon Creator
articles.author: 99 Bitcoins
articles.summary: Twitter founder Jack Dorsey is the latest high-profile figure to be put under the spotlight as a possible candidate for Bitcoin's founder. There is still an insane amount of mystery behind the actual creator of Bitcoin and the man behind the Satoshi Nakamoto alias. Hal Finney, Nicky Wurzelbacher, and others have left a mark on the world without leaving a trace.

articles.title: Solo Bitcoin Miner Bags $360K in Rare BTC Block Win
articles.author: Coin Desk
articles.summary: A solo miner solved block 910440 on their own and pocketed 3.137 BTC worth more than $362,000 over the weekend. The block contained over 4,100 transactions and was processed through CKpool, a platform that allows individuals to contribute hash power without formally joining a network.

articles.title: Bitmine And Donald Trump Spent The Weekend Stacking Ethereum, Here's How Much They Got

articles.summary: Tom Lee's BitMine and Donald Trump's World Liberty Financial have been buying the dip amid the recent ETH price crash. Both companies spent almost $140 million buying ETH as they doubled down on their bet on the largest altcoin by market cap, ETH.

articles.title: Thailand plans launch of a crypto payment sandbox for tourists
articles.author: Bit RSS
articles.summary: The Thai government is reportedly set to allow tourists to exchange crypto for Thai baht and make electronic payments through e-money service providers, according to reports from the Financial Times. The government has not commented on the reports yet.    .

articles.author: Coin Desk
articles.summary: Internet Computer Protocol (ICP) has lost 7% of its value in the last 24 hours. The token dropped to a low of $5.27, breaking through critical support levels. There are concerns about sustained institutional interest in the project, according to CoinDesk Research.
